description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
51 – 53 Canonbury Park North, Islington, London, N1 2UJ

TPO Reference:
T8 - London Plane of LBI TPO (No.322) 2007
T9 - Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.322) 2007
T20 – Horse Chestnut of LBI TPO (No.322) 2007
T19 - Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.322) 2007

PO Number:
T100176

Work specifications:

Front Gardens:
1 x London Plane (T8) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.322) 2007
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 8m above ground level (to the height of the guttering)

1 x Sycamore (T9) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.322) 2007
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 7m above ground level.
Crown thin by a maximum of 20% and remove deadwood.

Rear Gardens:
1 x Horse Chestnut (T20) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.322) 2007
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 10m above ground level by the removal of epicormic growth and x3 -4 sub-laterals growing over the road at the rear.
Crown thin by a maximum of 20% and remove deadwood

1 x Lime (T19) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.322) 2007
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 7m above ground level.
